title: Bug 101187Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: Bug 101187Localization key can't be blank when adding. Description:If key is blank, externalized text can't be displayed in chart.Steps to reproduce:1.
OB: When the key in the properties file is left blank, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title even if the key in the properties file is blank.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Set the externalized text in the chart title.
2. Leave the key blank in the properties file.
